name: Still Life 5.0
description: Fizz Pop (b.1974), Still Life 5.0, 2010, 4200 x 3360 pixels: Sourcing Vincent van Goghâ€™s, Sunflowers, 1888, 92.1 cm x 73cm, Still Life 5.0 repurposes my Planet 01 to build the centre of several sunflowers. As the series shifted from the Golden Age to Post-Impressionism, it became intriguing how the digital medium could function as a mirror to reflect the diverse history of painting.
